scripts.say: Multiple Pawns have been Awakened at the same time, which makes the experiment a huge success.
But what are you gonna do about the situation? If they steal the backup of the Original then it'll disrupt the war on the outside.
As long as the quarantine mechanism is in place, they can't leave the Mirror Sea.
In any case, White's evolutionary rate has drastically surpassed what the Natural Calculation System's simulations estimated.
Now that we know that, we've achieved our goal.
As a Tester, a living module within the debugging system, I plan to gather as much data for adjustments as possible.
I will confirm if they're offering their souls as a sacrifice or if they're hoping to checkmate us~
